website_summaries.verdict: This gentle cleansing tea is good for those with sensitive stomachs and other digestive issues.
pros: Cleanses waste, increases metabolism, provides digestive support
Creates an environment that promotes healthy stomach bacteria and probiotics
No artificial flavors, colors, or preservatives
Contains echinacea, papaya, peppermint, hibiscus, senna, and others
cons: Results are too gentle for some

customer_reviews.title: I lost 30Lbs
customer_reviews.text: If I use one tea bad it starts working in about 12hrs. If I use two it kicks in, in about 6-10hrs. I thought because I had 3 kids my belly fat was due to postpartum issues that were irreversible. Turns out with the proper diet, this tea, and exercise the belly weight just fell off with 2months! It tastes great too!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Weight Loss Resource
customer_reviews.text: I have lost 75 lbs and I continue using the Total Tea as an additional resource for my diet. It helps to regulate your digestive system and maintain the weight without losing your muscle weight. I take it at night before bedtime and in the morning I clean the system completely without having any stomach discomfort. Great product. I have been using it since 2017.
customer_reviews.author: ArisCB

customer_reviews.title: Love, love Total Tea!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I didn't realize how much this tea had been helping me until I had been out of it and hadn't been drinking it for a few days. I have IBS and find that drinking this each night at bedtime helps tremendously. Doctors have prescribed Linzess and other drugs which have been far too harsh for my system. Love, love Total Tea! And- it tastes good!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Good Tasting!
customer_reviews.text: I am not much of a hot tea drinker but needed some for a 30 day cleanse program. I surprisingly enjoy it, especially when it's nice and hot. I've squeezed a little orange or honey to spice it up and found I like it best just like it is. It has definitely helped my digestive system!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ragan

customer_reviews.title: Give it some time!
customer_reviews.text: In th beginning I didn’t see any results because it’s best not to use to much water and don’t drink the full cup right away. Work your way into the full cup of tea, the taste is pretty good, I didn’t have to add anything to it.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine

customer_reviews.title: Works, but stay close to a bathroom...
customer_reviews.text: I've been drinking this tea for six days now, combined with Thrive Le-Vel. As of this morning, I have lost 7 lbs in six days. Regardless of when you drink this tea (morning or evening), you will have to go to the bathroom within a few hours. I have noticed that when the "attack" hits me, I get awful belly cramps that last for approximately 10 seconds, then disappear. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: abt838

customer_reviews.title: This tea is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this tea! I recently tried another detox tea I saw on the internet and liked it, but it was almost 3 times the cost of this one. I decided to give Total Tea a try and from the very first cup I thought it tasted amazing! It's absolutely the best tea I've ever had and in just one month I've already lost 6lbs. I believe it has helped curb my appetite and overall I feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Clark

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good and works!
customer_reviews.text: The tea has a pleasant, fruity flavor that is easy to drink. Within two days it reduced the bloating that I was feeling and within a week I could see a marked difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Tea Does a Body Good
customer_reviews.text: I don’t use it every day, but when I do use it, it works fabulously. I often use it a few times a week to help keep me regular. It never fails to help me go and I also feel like even if I don’t use it, I am more regular these days. I often drink at night before bed, and I usually go first thing in the morning. I have it on my subscribe and save order now with amazon because I like it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness in a tea bag❣️
customer_reviews.text: Omg! I have 2 boys, I thought my stomach fat would never go away! I feel very happy after drinking this tea, I feel incredible and my stomach has gotten flatter! I received my order 5/3/20 been using ever since! I plan to use this until the end of the month! If necessary longer because it taste so good! I feel more attractive, confident. And I don’t have to hold my stomach in! Try this and you won’t be disappointed! 😊I’m a real person and this is a real review!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis P.

customer_reviews.title: Poor detox.  Very weak
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping that this tea would be good. The reviews were good. I think they got paid to write reviews but I’m very honest about my experience. This is the worst detox tea I’ve ever taken. It has no value to it. I took 3 teabags in the morning nothing took another 2 nothing took 1 more I was barely and I say barely able to go to the bathroom. It’s not effective at all. I took 4 then 3 three more all in one day and got some results. This tea does not work for me. I finished a box in 2 weekends. Poor product.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd  Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Just Tea , no detox
customer_reviews.text: This tea doesn't do anything for me except when I feel hungry at work before lunch time, I drink a cup and it stops my tummy from growling for an hour, but every tea does that so it's definately not an appetite suppressant. I don't really mind because it's a tasty tea and I drink tea all day every day anyways. It doesn't make me go to the bathroom. It's simply just another tea flavor for me. I'm going to try "tea bae" next to see if that is a better detox.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLyyfe

customer_reviews.title: Best detox tea and customer service hands down!
customer_reviews.text: The seller is very caring and thorough with their costumers. Best tasting detox tea I’ve honestly ever tried. Also I have spent $40 on other high end detox teas and I am telling you this $18 tea 🍵 more than outweighs the other competition! Depending on level of intensity you can handle with your bowel movements LOL I suggest you steep the tea for two minutes and if you can handle stronger “evacuations” I suggest steeping for 5-10 minuets. Also unlike other detox teas this actually gives you a good amount of energy and makes you feel really good.
customer_reviews.author: Darth Genesis

customer_reviews.title: I could not count how many times I went to the bathroom because the tea was so stimulating.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it last October but I have not eaten only two tea bags. When I drank tea first, it was too strong that I had diarrhea and continued to go to the bathroom. It is not the type of tea I can drink on weekdays. My second try was the same as the first try. I broke one tea bag into two glasses of tea as described in the instructions if it’s too strong, but still hurted a whole day! I think the price is also too expensive compared to other teas and I can not understand other reviews filled with before and after pictures or five stars based on my experience.
customer_reviews.author: kang3308

customer_reviews.title: Detox/Gassy
customer_reviews.text: The first time I took it I took two doses. I took one on a Sunday and then that next morning. Yes it helped me go without pain, BUT I was gassy for like a week after🙄. Not sure why but it was pretty savere. I tried the tea again this past Sunday and it worked fine, did not get as much gas. I have not tried it everyday, because I am scared of having to run from my desk at work every so often to use the restroom. I will try to use it up to seven days in the upcoming weeks and then I will try to leave another review if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't exactly say "gentle..."
customer_reviews.text: More like EXPLOSIVE. I have used many detox teas. This tastes great and does the job. Perhaps a bit too well. I would encourage new users to try it while you have several hours at home so you can enjoy the privacy of your own bathroom. Drinking it for the first time before a long road trip or, worse, a first date would be a most unfortunate choice. Let yourself get acclimated to it before drinking it and then, say, driving into work where there is one shared bathroom for your entire floor. Perhaps you won't have this issue, but do you really want to be in a public place if you do?
customer_reviews.author: JP Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Taste good - but thats it
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I decided to try it . I love tea, especially cinnamon tea. This was suppose to help with my appetite and help with digestion I read ..... I've been drinking it twice a day for a few weeks now and noticed nothing different . It taste delicious that's for sure but other than that - noticed nothing different .
customer_reviews.author: Viviann Soto

customer_reviews.title: Gentle, yes!
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste and the effect. That is, it send you to do number #2, so if that is what you are looking for, go ahead. It doesn't give me stomachaches as other teas do. This one is good to induce #2. As per weight loss, nah! It doesn't do anything to make you lose weight. Does going to the bathroom count as weight loss? Lol?
customer_reviews.author: AzulTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know how this got 4.5 stars cause it’s doing nothing for me. It tastes decent (hot or cold) but nothing is happening. Now, if I’m supposed to buy something else with this tea to make the detox “work better” then you should sell them together, not separately. Very disappointed in this tea. Again, nothings happened, and I actually feel bloated.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: This tea works great!! I am on my 7th or 8th ...
customer_reviews.text: This tea works great!! I am on my 7th or 8th box! It really decreases bloating and keeps me regular. Plus it is gentle on the tummy. Another bonus is the taste! It needs no sweetner at all. You won't be disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JCrawford

customer_reviews.title: Look forward to my cuppa of detox tea!
customer_reviews.text: I do enjoy the taste of this detox tea and look forward to my cuppa each morning. It does work well along with being very tasty. I can certainly feel/tell when I have missed a couple of days. I feel a bit bloated and sluggish. Back to my routine of a cuppa of detox and I feel much better! I have tried others and they don't measure up - certainly not in the tastiness of the tea. Alot of them taste like weeds (dandelion leaves?). Highly recommend this tea!
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T WORK, PLEASE DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: Never wrote a bad review before but I am so upset for buying this tea. It doesn't work at all. I've been drinking it for 5 days now, and I haven't used the toilet yet. My sis in law gave me 1 tea bag of skinny PM tea some time ago, and I slept like a baby. I should've bought skinny instead of this fake tea. This total tea makes me anxious all night after drinking it and I don't sleep well at all, no poop either. It's sad for paying for something and it doesn't work. If it was possible I would return it.
customer_reviews.author: Pris

customer_reviews.title: Helpful, delicious
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this twice: once for myself then for my husband, at his request. We find it works to help with digestive problems, particularly constipation. Also, the herbal combination in this tea is very good tasting. It's great when your medicine doesn't taste bad.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: The tea has a mild spicy flavor. I did not have to use sugar but it is even more pleasant with some sweetener. O drank it for three days before having a "go". I experienced no cramping or other distress. I cannot attest to weight loss because I am currently on WW. I gave this to my relative who is having great difficult with bowl functioning. It is too early to tell what the results are. I will report in the future. I will buy this again. I talked to my relative. She got results the next day!!! This is someone who has chronic constipation!!! She is going to buy this tea. GREAT
customer_reviews.author: Diane B.

customer_reviews.title: Tasty but no results - updated to four stars due to customer service
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I was contacted by the company and am in the process of being refunded for my purchase. I appreciate this level of support and wouldn't hesitate to do business with them again if I am interested in a different product. I've used the tea for 7 days now and haven't seen any results. It is tasty, though. Somewhere in the fine print I discovered that it can block estrogen, which I take to help control migraines. Sure enough, I'm starting to get daily migraines again. I have stopped using the tea. Disappointed - I had hoped to at least drop a pound or two and see some anti-bloating results.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this tea keeps my stomach flat and makes me feel great
customer_reviews.author: JaiMcW

customer_reviews.title: A soft but effective laxative
customer_reviews.text: They need to rename this to gentle laxative. It gets things moving. Nothing explosive and it is very gentle but it will clean you out. I started with once a day and steeped at recommended time. For me it started working the 2nd day and I continued the regimen for 3 total days because by day 3 I felt completely cleaned out. I was going like 4 times a day. Now i do one cup once a week.
customer_reviews.author: momma mia

customer_reviews.title: What detox? More like anti detox
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely garbage... all this product did was make me gassy and caused constipation. I used 1 bag for 1 week as directed... i never felt so bloated. Ended up having to take a stool softener just so I could go! The only thing I can say was good was the taste... if this was a daily drinking tea I'd buy again. But in the trash this goes. Ill stick to natural diuretics. I should have known better.. Absolute waste. Drink a gallon of water, a splash of lemon juice and ACV to "detox"
customer_reviews.author: Thirdseason

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it-Your guy will thank you
customer_reviews.text: This tea deserves every single star. Not only does it taste absolutely delicious but it gave me a gentle cleaning that helped jump start a diet I was looking to start. I lost 8 pounds. Now due to the senna in it I only used it for 7 days. I will be using this again after the Christmas Holiday where people tend to eat less than clean. Just buy it, your gut will thank you
customer_reviews.author: Steffane Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great prices gentle detox tea- TRY THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great truly gentle detox tea. I started out just drinking it on the weekend because I was nervous I’d spend time on the bathroom. I now drink it almost everyday. I have always had trouble staying regular. I drink it on the way to work. Most days it’ll produce a bowel movement but not everyday which is fine. It’s never explosive or causes me any pain. The tea tastes good. I add 1 packet of Splenda or stevia. I would definitely recommend to a friend. Well priced and does help with bloating as well. I will continue to drink it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This tea is AMAZING ! I started taking it a few weeks ago, and I can say I feel less bloated and just great. This tea is by far the best detox tea, you can detox and enjoy the taste of it at the same time. It does help clean me out. In comparison to other teas, pills etc this is the first one tat I’ve had that is extremely GENTLE and does not cramp your stomach up. Will continue to buy !! -Africa
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works and taste good
customer_reviews.text: I was using the product once a day and it wasn't really doing much. I started reading the reviews about using it twice a day am/pm to get better results. I now started using it twice a day and the result is amazing. I take iron on a regular, so it's hard for me to go. But this product make it so much easier and unlike other cleaners, it doesn't give me a stomach ache and oh yea, the taste is good. I put honey in mines, which makes the taste even better 😊
customer_reviews.author: Elexis B and Nancy B.

customer_reviews.title: Good laxative, BUT "detox teas" are BS
customer_reviews.text: I ignored the deceptive and harmful marketing trends around detox teas because I was looking for a gentle and tasty laxative for those occasional days when I feel a little blocked up. It works, but I won't buy it again because it's not what it's pretending to be. Cleanses don't work, and the only weight you'll love from this is what you expel once it kicks in. Your body is fine, and it doesn't need "cleansing". It's a tasty tea, but it's not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Webb

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Nice taste. Only been taking it for two days I can feel lighter and better. Gentle cleanse. Let’s you know gently that you have to use the bathroom. Best to take it at night cuz it’ll make u go in the morning. If u eat junk you’ll go more than you should lol. It’s a good for slowly helping to change your eating habits to better. You eat good, you’re good. You don’t eat good, you’ll regret it( in a gentle way) lol. I’m sure you’d rather not be in the bathroom a lot. Great product. Will order a second box soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tummy approve!
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting, I started seeing results after a few days. I make one cup in the morning and one late at night after dinner. You will have a flush every morning and sometimes late in the night, it doesn't bother me personally it seems that's the product doing its job. Most importantly no excruciating stomach pain.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Great for Sleep
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a big "detoxer" but this tea was recommended to me as a sleep aid. It works great! About 30 minutes after having my nightly cup I fall into a coma until my alarm goes off lol. Normally I can't sleep through the night but have been ever since starting Total Tea. My first day after drinking it I pooped my brains out but after that it's had no effect on my stomach. Highly recommend as a sleep aid; can't speak to the detox as I think detoxing is bs.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Grubba

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea!! As someone who can’t stand the taste of any tea believe me when I say that not only is this tea delicious it works! The energy this tea gives me is amazing! It wakes me up and keeps me going through the day. I’ve recommended this tea to all my friends and family and have got many hooked on it already!
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia

customer_reviews.title: Made me EXTREMELY ill! Seller doesn’t accept returns.
customer_reviews.text: Had the worst night ever after just one cup of this. Horrible stomach cramping, and triggered my restless leg syndrome, the worst I’ve had in over 20 years. Was up the entire night in so much pain followed by horrible diarrhea the next day. That’s not even considering how bad the flavor is and the seller doesn’t accept returns. Now I see why they won’t! They clearly know their product is awful. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: RI

customer_reviews.title: cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Be careful with this tea, ONLY allow it to seep for no more than 5 to 10 minutes. I let it seep overnight in an insulated cup and took it in the morning and nothing happened. So I did it again and drank it that night. The next day boy did my ass explode. It really cleaned me out. So make sure you only allow it to seep no longer than 5 - 10 minutes. Stuff really gets you cleaned out, you're not running to the bathroom. It's a one and done deal. I learned my lesson don't leave the teabag in.
customer_reviews.author: LafaLot

customer_reviews.title: Happy Tea Time - good Taste !!
customer_reviews.text: Just got and tried - taste good, but I was concerned that I had to sift it, since the bag wasn’t sealed good enough, some herbs were floating around - minor issue ! I will update after 2 weeks or so! I am accustom to detox teas that give you cramps and then .... but hoping this one isn’t going to be that bad and that it can help with the Bloating :) Update to follow ... Happy Tea Time !
customer_reviews.author: Myra MLH

customer_reviews.title: Would prefer a powdered form
customer_reviews.text: This tea is okay would prefer it to come in a powder form. The tea bags have to steep a long while and if the water is too hot the white netting rips and the contents float around in the cup. Cheap bags perhaps? Powder would solve all.
customer_reviews.author: Ink Vine

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for a chronic constipation sufferer
customer_reviews.text: As someone who's been suffering from chronic constipation for pretty much my entire life, nothing has worked on me to become 'regular.' I tried all types of diets, natural remedies, and several strong Rx-s, but none of them worked. Then, I started a new regimen of brewing this tea mixed with 3 teaspoons of magnesium supplement powder (I buy this magnesium powder: ( every night before I go to bed and my life changed! Now I usually do my 'business' each morning after I have breakfast. The result has been so dramatic that I even take these tea bags and magnesium powder whenever I go on a vacation. No stomachache is a huge plus!
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: We Love This Tea
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tasting tea. I don't need to add any sweetener - the tea has a natural sweetness to it. The flavor is very refreshing - I have only had it hot, but I suspect it would make a great iced tea too. My husband drinks several cups a day with no negative effects, even though it is technically a detox tea. We highly recommend this tea, whether for health benefits or just enjoying a great tasting tea.
customer_reviews.author: mom2two

customer_reviews.title: Great tea
customer_reviews.text: So I waited few days to see how the tea works before I wrote the review so here it goes...I have a problem with my bowl for a long time I go every 2 to 3 days if I'm lucky and always bloated...the first day I took the tea i went once the 2nd day i went twice the 3rd day on i went 3 to 4 times and for some reason I'm not as hungry either..this product is not for a diet it helps you cleanse but in the meantime its helping not being as hungry the flavor of the tea is delicious I dont need sugar to sweeten it...I highly recommend this tea
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I started off sipping...I didnt go until end of the day...had another full glass and decided to down if right away...in welp that made me go right away lol...the smell is like a nutmeg cinnamon type of aroma very nice. UPDATE: I LOST 1 POUND IN JUST ONE WEEK !!! NO EXERCISE JUST CALORIE WATCH. B4 THE TEA I WAS INTERMITTENT FASTING ..STILL IS..BUT MY BELLY QWNT DOWN SO FAST. I THINK ITS THE CINNAMON BARK...CINNAMON HELP AIDE IN GUT BACTERIA WHICH IS GOOD.
customer_reviews.author: Prettybri

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I’m almost done with a complete box and will order again. I feel so much better than I did 2 weeks ago. Don’t know what all it can help with but I’ve lost 7#. I’m in my 70s and don’t exercise but I can imagine that it would help even more if I started a silver sneakers program in addition to the tea. It’s a nice morning cup of tea and I will continue to drink it every morning just wish it wasn’t so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Litlbitartsy

customer_reviews.title: 😟
customer_reviews.text: I let it steep 10-15 in 6 ounces of water. It tasted like I was drinking just straight warm water I was looking forward to the taste because it smells really good. I’m not sure each box has the same potency. It took a couple of days before I went to bathroom didn’t have any explosive stools I went more than I usually go but don’t feel like I’ve been detoxed. I’ve only taken 4 doses will update if any changes
customer_reviews.author: Unique

customer_reviews.title: I wasted my money
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work. It’s just tea. I have problems going “number two” and I have to use teas like this. I pay about $40 a box for the stuff that actually works. Thought I’d try this and see if I could save some money. Guess you really do get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: AMY L HALL

customer_reviews.title: 🍯 honey
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I won’t lie, I am not a hot tea drinker. I actually bought this almost two years ago. I tried it and hated it and it’s sat in my cabinet. The smell reminds me of the soap and make up section on Whole Foods. Fast forward two years I pulled it back out to try it again. I put a table spoon of honey in it and it made it bearable for me( I actually almost finished the glass ) I know other people who are tea drinkers and they love it. It gives you kind of a refreshed feeling. Put some honey in it and it’ll be good!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great tea but does cause cramping
customer_reviews.text: Whew this tea works but the cramps are painful. I just started which may be why I'm cramping. I will continue to use and hope the cramping stops Bec besides that the tea taste good and it does work
customer_reviews.author: Julybeauty

customer_reviews.title: A Tasty Tea That Keeps You Honest
customer_reviews.text: I am normally not a tea drinker, but love the flavor of this tea. I have a hot cup every evening when I am unwinding from my day. I look forward to it and It helps to keep me from snacking at night. This might be TMI, but It also helps to gently keep me regular without the cramping feelings that come from other cleansing products. I have been using this tea for 3-4 months and will continue.
customer_reviews.author: Redshrink

customer_reviews.title: Does not make me go
customer_reviews.text: So I been using this product for four days , as far as detoxing I’m not sure what to say, it doesn’t not make me have the urge to go, I have to be forcing myself to go. I find that when you drink it in the AM it does make you feel energetic and carve you appetite for I would say 4 hours. But how I’m I going to get rid of toxins in my body if it doesn’t give you the urge to go, I see people say they go Atleast three times I have not been getting that feeling ..
customer_reviews.author: Leann nelson

customer_reviews.title: Gentle Enough
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this is gentle. I does not make you go running to the restroom, but it does make it a lot easier. Like if you are experiencing "rush hour traffic congestion", or feeling sluggish due to not eating right, Total Tea is the traffic cop standing in the intersection blowing it's whistle and moving traffic along at an acceptable pace. The taste is lightly citrusy, so I typically put 2 bags in 6oz of Vitamin Water (Orange-Orange flavor) and bring to a boil. After letting it cool for a bit, I pour it into a small bottle and use it as concentrate by adding some to other beverages occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Rubee Bailey

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTE WASTE!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product based on the good reviews and the input of my coworkers. However, the box I received was useless. I drank the tea for several nights in a row with out any results or difference. Then, I had my roommate (who has done the detox before) try the protocol and she said the same thing, something was off. So, the next night i tried double bags and double steep time with half the water. Still nothing. This product may be good for some but the inconsistency in product will result in me not ordering again to find out. $20 wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Peterson

customer_reviews.title: ... for the last year and a half and absolutely love it! It’s really the only tea I drink
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been drinking Total Tea for the last year and a half and absolutely love it! It’s really the only tea I drink. Not to be too descriptive but the befitits of how it keeps me regular is definitely a selling point. I love the taste. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Thompson

customer_reviews.title: I love this tea
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea. I have purchased it 3 times now. It really detox you. It’s better then the flat tummy tea. It don’t cramp u up or anything. U will urniate more frequently and the 💩 will be amazing. No runs or excessive going.
customer_reviews.author: Jaleesa

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this tea because of the awesome reviews! This tea has a good citrus taste and it’s enjoyable! Unlike some other teas, you just want to chug it down. I enjoy drinking this tea at night because in the morning, you can do your business. It’s very gentle on your body. Other teas I tried, made my stomach sore and felt the urge to go right away but with this one, no stomach pains just the feeling that you need to go. Would definitely purchase this again!
customer_reviews.author: Rncbaby

customer_reviews.title: The Poops
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally leave reviews, however I've made an exception for this Tea. This stuff is the poops, literally. I've been hunting for all types of bowl cleaners for awhile. This included healthy changes in my diet as well. I thot I was fairly clean, given the weight I had lost and the betterment of my well being. I drank this stuff and holy moly did it chisel some shi! Out. No rush accidents like some flushes and took about 15 hours for me to really start the process. I'm content with it so far, and so is my hungry mouthed toilet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: This tea did not worked at all. I took it for two consecutive weeks and did not see any results.
customer_reviews.author: Reina V.

customer_reviews.title: Really gives you energy
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea, it really works. I was feeling very tired, so I ordered this tea for energy, have been taking this for over a week and I feel good, and my clothes fits so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I drink this tea every night before bed. It is tasty and relaxing. I feel a big difference in bloating that I was suffering from. I feel no bloat anymore and it has also kept me regular. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: MamaAmity

customer_reviews.title: SENNA TEA = LAXATIVE
customer_reviews.text: Beware this is a "Senna"tea . Which contains a laxative!! Not what I was looking for in a detox, should have read more info ..
customer_reviews.author: DesMarie

customer_reviews.title: Great tea for "normal" folk.
customer_reviews.text: This tea works great but I have a very complicated system. This tea made bowel movements a reality -- for only a short while due to my "jacked up" digestive system but it DID work.
customer_reviews.author: Yoicie

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor and Helped Relieve Bloating
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy this tea to help me loose weight. I purchased it to help me on days when I need a little help with doing #2. I love the flavor and it doesn't give me major cramps like some others teas with Senna do. I usually take it in the evening and when I wake up I do my business. Sometimes again later that day. A few times I have felt bloated and I've taken the tea and it's helped relieve my stomach.
customer_reviews.author: kep

customer_reviews.title: USUALLY WORKS
customer_reviews.text: This is a DETOX tea, so it is supposed to make one get rid of unwanted toxins and to go to the bathroom. I've drunk as many as 2 or 3 cups in a day with no results that day, however the next day or two days later, it finally works. I still drink it though.
customer_reviews.author: Agatha Istanbul

customer_reviews.title: This tea works if you work with it...
customer_reviews.text: This tea works if you work with it. At first it gently cleans you out and helps calm cravings. Second you cut back to once a day or every other day to maintain balanced and detox; long term helping to reduce cravings and feel more nourished from your foods. I recommend drinking a different tea during the day. I drink oolong in the morning because it has caffeine and chamomile late after noon. Before I go to bed I have a cup of detox tea as the last thing I put in my body for the night. I exercise daily and eat right, and I am down a few pounds. Been using it for about 6 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ripped bags inside
customer_reviews.text: I just picked up my package and I opened it in my car and all the tea leaves went flying everywhere!! I looked inside the box and there was a ripped tea bag. So I’m curious as to how this even happened if it’s supposed to be sealed in the box. I’m kind of afraid to drink the other ones :/!!
customer_reviews.author: vvazquez

customer_reviews.title: I followed my heart and reviews !!! THE BEST HANDS DOWN
customer_reviews.text: Omg the best gentle detox EVER !!!! Does exactly what it suppose to and taste wonderful !! Only thing i do is add honey and a squeeze of a fresh lemon . I’ve did iaso , this and many more detox’s . This is the one !! Will get the job done ina timely matter , make you feel so brand new !! I drunk it ina morning and at night i feel like first thing ina morning gives you energy and very much efffective .
customer_reviews.author: Rakia McCaffity

customer_reviews.title: THE REAL DEAL!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: First, this is DELICIOUS!!!! I would love to just drink it all day as a tea, but I would find my self in the bathroom too often!!! It really works to detox....if detox means emptying the body. No cramping, just feels healthy and works gently but effective. Other teas like this I have found hard to drink because of the taste, but this one KNOCKS IT OUT OF THE PARK!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nan Markert

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!
customer_reviews.text: I always worry about how I'll like the flavor of a tea but this seemed like a can't lose choice; orange and cinnamon? What's not to love? I usually don't care for the flavor of cloves, which this has, but it isn't overpowering and even when I forget and let it steep longer than normal it still isn't too strong. My GI tract is getting back into regularity since I've been using it and I have been struggling with that since the holidays. Will be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing changed
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this tea about 20 days now. I kept hoping it would work. Unfortunately for me I did not see any difference. I still remained somewhat constipated. The tea may have helped just a little, not the relief I hoped for. Too expensive and the "Dieters Tea" works better than this one and is less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Johari

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Total Tea Gentle Detox Tea is one of the best detox on the market. I have tried several which they did not great, messy and failed to live up to their claim. But Total Detox Tea is very refreshing and smell great. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Ayesha A.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recomended
customer_reviews.text: I dont usually like to write reviews but this tea is awesome i love it. Very gentle and the taste is awesome too. I love it love it!! Highly recomended. I notice that if i drink one in the morning and one at night is too much but onw in the morning should be good.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Pretty Good!
customer_reviews.text: I had some stomach pains the first couple of days but I have been pretty regular since I started drinking this at night. I've missed a couple of nights so far but I haven't had a huge weight loss yet. I am less bloated which is nice. I will buy again to give it more time to see how I do with results. Tastes pretty good!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Delfosse

customer_reviews.title: Waste of My Mondy
customer_reviews.text: I so wanted this to work but it did not do anything for me. I used the entire box and the results were not good. I wanted it to work but it just didn't.
customer_reviews.author: BVO

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: This is reminiscent of a spiced tea, with a very strong orange flavor. I’m not a fan of hot tea, so I drink it as iced tea. One cup doesn’t necessarily give me much constipation relief, but I found that 2 cups makes me sick to my stomach. Literally with vomiting and diarrhea several hours later. Beware. Quite expensive as well.
customer_reviews.author: alwayshappy

customer_reviews.title: It tastes really good and I hate tea
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled my whole life with constipation and nothing worked! This stuff is my saving grace. It tastes really good and I hate tea. No harsh side effects. I will use this for life!
customer_reviews.author: Melea

customer_reviews.title: Box already opened
customer_reviews.text: Yea Box was already opened. Not sure if I should even try it since it was already opened. I should’ve read all the reviews about their boxes being tampered with :/ what a waste
customer_reviews.author: AshleyRose

customer_reviews.title: The only positive side is the great taste, that’s it.
customer_reviews.text: This tea is not what it says to be. It is not a detoxificatier or cleanser, it doesn’t make u lose weight, it doesn’t help with bloating and it doesn’t improve mood or give energy. The only positive side of it was the great taste which is why I gave 2 stars. That’s about it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Majid

customer_reviews.title: Taste ok but didn't work for me....
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste but did not work for me. Took this for 4 days straight and NOTHING happened. No bowel movement at all. I've took a more expensive Detox before and it only took a day for a bowel movement. This product has made me more constipated than before. Sad to have wasted my money on a low budget Detox Tea. Sadly I had high hope for this one since it was rated #1 of the best detox tea's on a particular website that I reviewed before purchasing. I suggest the website do better job at rating which detox tea is worth the purchase. Smh
customer_reviews.author: Erica Love

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting tea.
customer_reviews.text: Today is my first day of drinking the tea. I wanted to share that the flavor is good and it's fresh. I hope I get the results I'm looking for, keep you guys posted on the results.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: How could you not love this product!?
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have stomach issues that make going to the restroom every day a difficult task. Since I’ve started using this tea I’ve been more regular, more energized and not as bloated. I’ve recommended this product to a few of my friends and it’s worked just as great for them. I’m not one to sponsor or advise anyone on a product that I’m not completely in love with or trust. On a scale of 1- I’m in love, i’d consider myself love struck!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I have become something of a health nut and really didn't know what to expect with this tea, but the tea is wonderful. I take it just before bed. I sleep better, and my digestive system and such seems to be improving and it tastes good also! I really believe this tea is making a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Norris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tea
customer_reviews.text: My package came on time no hassles. First time trying this tea I expected it to taste awful but it exceeded my expectations, it has a real cinnamon taste. After consuming the tea it acts within a few hours then you’ll start to fell it working more so if you feeling bloated. I would definitely recommend tea. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Magdalena

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: So far, been on this for 4 days and I have to say, it does as it says. I haven’t checked my weight yet but it does help me with my bowel Movements in the morning. I take mine right after my last meal and will let my tea seep for 20 min instead of 10 (I like mine stronger). Flavor is perfect too; not too strong.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I was afraid it would be hard ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I was afraid it would be hard to drink or that it might not have the best flavor but fortunately it's very good. I have felt so much better overall since I began drinking this tea. I love how it's gentle so it doesn't hit as hard. I definitely recommend this product, at least give it a try - you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Ivette

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: My metabolism has sped up, I burn more calories during my workouts, I am able to eat smaller portions and be satisfied. I love this stuff! It has been an amazing addition to my weight loss journey and keeps the pounds coming off consistent. I have recommended this to many people and one person has seen results in just a few days. It is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany B

customer_reviews.title: Actually tastes great hot and iced
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked at how good this tea tastes! It tastes amazing. I love it hot and cold. I like to drink it at night and mix it with sleepy time tea. During the day I just let it cool then ice it and it’s delicious. I did not feel it gave me any overwhelming urge or abdominal pains. Ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse mama

customer_reviews.title: Ginger tea with raw honey; perfect nighttime drink!
customer_reviews.text: I love this detox tea. When I make a cup each night, I add a little raw honey to sweeten it a little. Gets rid of those nightly sugar cravings!! Will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Sally McGarrity

customer_reviews.title: Detox goodness !
customer_reviews.text: Unlike other laxative / detox teas, there’s no cramping and the constant need to be in the bathroom with fear of having an oops moment. Flavor is great and takes great hot/ cold. Vowel movement was easy and didn’t require we spending my day in the bathroom. I’m on day 3 and will drink every other day . Will post a new update after I complete the box
customer_reviews.author: Wendy’s

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the tummy
customer_reviews.text: To me it doesn't have any taste. It did detox me and give me warning (bowel movements) to let me know when it was time for the bathroom. I did not stick to being consistent so I can see weight loss results but I feel like if you keep using it and eating right, you will see results.
customer_reviews.author: Sissy

customer_reviews.title: Natural tea for total cleanse
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I just can't eat my greens and hydrate properly, so after feeling blocked and bloated, I take Total Tea Detox in the evening and it reliably cleans out my blocked colon the next morning. It's a cinnamon flavored tea that is not caffeinated so it's quite tasty and soothing before bed. More gentle and natural than a laxative, it works better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Monica B.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived with a broken seal and no way to exchange the product?
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G.

customer_reviews.title: No results . yet?
customer_reviews.text: So i was very hyped to try this product because i feel like my body NEEDS a detox it has been 3 days since i first tried , the first night i had 2 teas with a less water than recommended with no results did not make me use the restroom AT ALL i re-read the instructions and tried using 2 tea bags still no luck i will continue to use it since its still a little soon to tell will keep you guys posted
customer_reviews.author: Dora Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: Did not see any benefits of this tea whatsoever. It’s been a week since I started drinking it and nothing .
customer_reviews.author: nicky

customer_reviews.title: It makes you Go.........
customer_reviews.text: Do not drink before a road trip. It is good. It works as far as making you GO. Helps with bloating and certainly cleanses. Cant say anything about fat burning etc. good taste. Try when you know you will be at work or home. Kicks in after 8-12hrs
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Demirci

customer_reviews.title: Great start to my Day!
customer_reviews.text: My 1st step to a perfect Day taste is great and effects are gentle i do a cup every other day and every other week my system works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Paula hendy

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I was definitely skeptical when I first came across this product! Thought it was too good to be true but other reviews convinced me to give it a go. It arrived within a few days in perfect condition. The instructions and Benefits of using am or pm are listed on the box and the process is simple! I’ve only been using for a total of about 2 weeks but I have been experiencing the benefit since day 3! You can actually feel it working. I’ve lost a few pounds and my body feels pretty cleansed. With this tea and healthier eating habits I’m excited to see what sticking to the next box of this detox tea will do for me!
customer_reviews.author: john tyler bayles

customer_reviews.title: The tea does work for detox and doesn't taste bad. It will take a little more time to ...
customer_reviews.text: I did receive my order and I am drinking the tea daily. The tea does work for detox and doesn't taste bad. It will take a little more time to get a better idea on how my body accepts the detox.
customer_reviews.author: Linda in Sacramento

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Great taste, bloating is gone and after one week I did see Improvement in my bowel movements that is the main reason I purchased this tea. Would never spend $18 on a tea but I have to make an exception for this one will continue to buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Vannie

product_meta.title: Total Tea Caffeine Free Detox Tea - All Natural - Slimming Herbal Tea for Gentle Cleansing - 25 Tea Bags
feature_bullets: Gentle Detox Tea for Weight Loss: This herbal tea promotes weight loss & digestion while increasing metabolism. Total Tea was originally only available for doctors and chiropractors but recently has been made available to the public. Keto diet friendly gluten free tea!

Natural Detox Cleanse: Total Tea does not contain green tea or caffeine, so it is a safe sleep tea to drink at night, unlike many other detox teas. It detoxifies, soothes, and cleanses the digestive tract. Many customers claim that they sleep better and have less stress after using our teatox.

Boost Energy: Our herbal detox tea naturally increases energy levels without caffeine or chemicals. Total Tea contains no artificial flavors, colors, or preservatives and is gluten free and Kosher certified. Our detox tea is great for men and women.

Bloating Relief and Weight Loss: Total Tea's great-tasting slimming tea helps reduce bloating with a powerful natural laxative, Senna. It helps mobilize any undigested food in your body to get you feeling better and on your way in no time!

Anti-Inflammatory Tea: A detox tea cleanse that contains 10 key ingredients that each play a vital role in reducing inflammation in the entire digestive tract. Instead of reducing water weight, Total Tea contains ingredients that help remove toxins from the digestive system to improve your diet & exercise.
